title: IBM Cloudant Docs
introduction: The IBM Cloudant portfolio includes two complementary, document-oriented NoSQL database-as-a-service offerings on the IBM Cloud. In addition to the comprehensive information in the IBM Cloudant docs, links to additional sources of information are provided below.

links.title: Understanding your responsibilities when you use IBM Cloudant
Getting help and support for IBM Cloudant

section_highlights.title: Cloudant Blog
section_highlights.description: IBM Cloudant database introduction and use cases.

section_highlights.title: IBM Cloudant plans
section_highlights.description: Describes the plans you can use with IBM Cloudant and how IBM Cloudant calculates usage.
